mapper.select: SELECT c.*, s.student_name, i.course_name, i.course_subject, i.course_diff, i.course_price, i.course_img_name, i.teacher_name FROM (SELECT * FROM cart WHERE academy_id = #{academyId}) c INNER JOIN (SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student WHERE academy_id=#{academyId} ) s ON c.student_id = s.student_id INNER JOIN (SELECT course_id, course_name, course_subject, course_diff, course_price, course_img_name, teacher_name FROM course INNER JOIN (SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM teacher WHERE academy_id = #{academyId}) t ON course.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE academy_id = #{academyId}) i ON c.course_id = i.course_id WHERE c.student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart VALUES (#{cartId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, NULL, NULL, #{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{academyId})
